page.title: 09RELIGIOUS INFORMATION
page.content: The church itself dates back to 1836, which is comparatively new for a church (most churches date back to the fifteenth century).Three hundred people can be seated in the church very comfortably; four hundred and fifty at a maximum amount;The only time it is this full is at weddings or funerals. In nineteen eighty-four the income for the year was approximately twenty thousand pounds, which is perfectly adequate for the upkeep of the church. The Reverend himself does not run any village communities, such as mother's group; he thinks that there are enough things going on in the village.The only other religions in the area are; Baptist, Scientologists and Anthroposophy.
